mapper.insert:
insert into expedia_detail_info (hotel_id, registry_number, spoken_languages, tax_id, descriptions_en, descriptions, rates, all_inclusive) values
(#{item.hotelId},#{item.registryNumber},#{item.spokenLanguages},#{item.taxId},#{item.descriptionsEn}, #{item.descriptions},#{item.rates},#{item.allInclusive})
